product_sketch: An AI-powered emotional regulation coaching app that helps users identify emotional triggers, develop healthy coping strategies, and build emotional resilience through personalized guidance and real-time support.

problem_hypotheses.label: emotional_overwhelm
problem_hypotheses.description: Users experience intense emotional overwhelm that interferes with daily functioning and decision-making, leading to avoidance behaviors and relationship strain.

problem_hypotheses.label: trigger_identification
problem_hypotheses.description: Users struggle to identify and understand their emotional triggers, making it difficult to develop effective coping strategies and maintain emotional stability.

problem_hypotheses.label: negative_thought_patterns
problem_hypotheses.description: Users engage in persistent negative thought patterns that amplify emotional distress and prevent them from accessing positive coping resources.

problem_hypotheses.label: coping_skill_gaps
problem_hypotheses.description: Users lack effective coping skills and default to maladaptive behaviors when faced with emotional challenges.
